name: Capital Ring link to Richmond station

ai.summary: A short, easy urban segment of the Capital Ring near Richmond station in London, about 1.2 km. This leg offers a quick taste of London's green spaces, with mostly flat, paved paths suitable for a relaxed stroll.
ai.terrain_summary: Predominantly flat, paved paths through parks and urban streets, with short sections of grass or greenspace.
ai.safety_notes: An urban walk: stay on marked paths, watch for cyclists and other pedestrians, and use traffic crossings safely. Bring a charged phone for navigation and check the forecast for rain or cold. Wear appropriate footwear.
recommended_gear: Phone with map or offline navigation
ai.best_seasons: Year-round; spring and autumn are particularly pleasant, but the route is short enough to enjoy in any season.

seo.meta_description: Discover a short, easy 1.2 km segment of the Capital Ring near Richmond station in London. Urban green spaces, flat paths, and a quick, scenic stroll.
